diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Gallstone pancreatitis, acute cholangitis, urinary tract infection, ileus
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: ETOH cirrhosis, COPD, Grave's disease s/p RIA, colon CA s/p R colectomy, vertigo, cholecystitis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Patient presented with right upper quadrant abdominal pain for 8 hours, with a history of acute cholecystitis previously treated with antibiotics only, indicating a likely recurrence of biliary pathology leading to gallstone pancreatitis and acute cholangitis.
